Metadata.Title: IIS Is Configured for W3C Extended Log File Format Auditing
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that IIS is configured for W3C Extended log file format auditing.


How to Fix

You can configure IIS W3C Extended Log File Format Auditing by selecting W3C Extended Log File Format on the Web Site tab of the Web site's properties dialog box. You can then choose Extended Properties such as URI Stem and URI Query.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
